org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data

Class LCNSyntax

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data.LCNSyntax

  • public final class LCNSyntax
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines most of the LCNSyntax, its identifiers etc. It should (can) not be instantiated.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek

      • isOutlet

        public static boolean isOutlet(java.lang.String input)
        Returns whether an input represents an outlet of a module or not.
        Parameters:
        input - The input as String.
        Returns:
        True if the input represents an outlet, false otherwise.
